# isEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the configuration is enabled.

## Declaration

```swift
final var isEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The system starts the providers only when this property is `true`.

## Accessing provider properties

- **evaluationProviderBundleIdentifier**: The bundle identifier of the hotspot evaluation provider.
- **authenticationProviderBundleIdentifier**: The bundle identifier of the hotspot authentication provider.
